evidenceLevels.high: Multiple independent sources confirm; official documentation available
evidenceLevels.medium: Single authoritative source or multiple secondary sources
evidenceLevels.low: Unverified reports; speculation; single non-authoritative source

notClaiming: Endorsement of any project or service
